price: 95. Diles: «Si los ángeles caminaran tranquilamente por la tierra (o la habitaran), les habríamos enviado del cielo a un ángel como mensajero».
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَلَٰٓئِكَةٞ يَمۡشُونَ مُطۡمَئِنِّينَ لَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَلَكٗا رَّسُولٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna fī al-arḍi malāikatun yamshūna muṭ'ma-innīna lanazzalnā ʿalayhim mina al-samāi malakan rasūlan
